name: Chicken Wolf Grain
description:
You are a farmer, running errands around rivers, with only your trusty boat you must work everything out.

TALK TO YOUR PACKAGES!

You can talk to the objects, including a bag of grain!

SO MANY LEVELS!

There are 5 levels. One of them doesn't really even count, so there are basically 4 levels. This is a very early prototype.

UNIQUE ARTSTYLE

Almost looks like a 4 year old drew it, but even then a 4 year old would probably do better!

UNCOVER A SECRET GOVERNMENT SUBPLOT ABOUT HOW THE CHICKEN IS SECRETLY TRYING TO ACHIEVE WORLD DOMINATION yeah sorry none of that this is a VERY EARLY PROTOTYPE but like if you want that lmk

If you do take the time to play this thank you so much and I would love to hear feedback about the gameplay or anything.
